attributes.action: Stop the British army's pay change and save soldiers losing money !!!!!!!!
attributes.additional_details: After everything are soldiers have done for us over the past few years.The government have decided to change there pay.The head of the army's pay review board spoke out,the government SACKED him.He wanted soldiers to get an increase In pay.Help British soldiers out,they can't strike like police or firefighters as they would be arrested.There frustrated and stuck,many of them are wanting to find new jobs.But if the gorvernment listen and stop the pay change they could save many people leaving.
attributes.background: The government are changing the pay for soldiers.There freezing pay for 2 years on promotion and removing increase levels.They've made a brief with loads of jargon to try and confuse soldiers,but the main message is people are going to lose out.Soldiers can't strike,they don't have a union.
